How Chimes! Works

Getting started is simple. Follow these three easy steps and never miss your favorite ice cream again.

1

Set Your Location

Allow location access or manually set your area preferences. Choose your notification radius and customize your settings for the perfect experience.

2

Get Instant Notifications

Receive real-time push notifications when ice cream vans enter your area. Get alerts with location details and estimated arrival times.

3

Enjoy Your Ice Cream

Head out to meet the van and enjoy your favorite frozen treats! Share your experience and help the community by confirming van locations.

Ready to get started?
